sentences.sentence: He addressed the clinical aspects of paedophilia and abuse.
sentences.translation: 他谈及了恋童癖和虐待的临床方面。

sentences.sentence: Yet contemporary studies in psychiatry and related fields have enabled the Church to gain deeper insights into paedophilia.
sentences.translation: 然而，当代精神病学及相关学科的研究，令教会对娈童癖有了更深入的认识。
